About the Company: Sangal Papers Ltd is a major manufacturer and supplier of newsprint paper. The company is also dealing in activity & construction paper.Product range of the company includes:News Print Paper This newsprint is manufactured using tones of newspaper mesh by recycling them. They generally supply two kinds of news print paper like white paper and color newsprint. Both have high strength tinsel and opacity with smooth surface that allows printing of photos.Activity & Construction Paper -These papers are easily printed and can be cut into various dimensions. These are generally used in various types of creativity work. These are available in both thick and soft texture with glazed and rough surfaces in a variety of colors.
